title: 7 Best Sri Lanka Beach Resorts To Enjoy Your Stay
text:
Home > Hotels & Resorts > 7 Best Sri Lanka Beach Resorts To Enjoy Your Stay 7 Best Sri Lanka Beach Resorts To Enjoy Your Stay By admin on July 9, 2015 Pin It 
Sri Lanka is an island in tea drop shape and it serves as a home to several beautiful beaches. This beach destination is not as commercialized as the other beach destinations located in Southeast Asia but it always boasts of pristine and uncrowded beaches filled with emerald waters. 
The beach resorts of Sri Lanka have always been beautifully maintained to be able to serve the holidaying crowd at the island. Best Sri Lanka Beach Resorts 
Some of the best Sri Lanka beach resorts, where you can enjoy stay during your visit include: Era Beach 
This resort has been beautifully designed showcasing a very sturdy Dutch influence. This is a colonial style residence featuring two bungalows with tiled sloping roofs. There is an additional two-storey section which accommodates the bedrooms that display a seamless blend. 
For booking and other details: Era Beach Paradise Road The Villa Bentota 
Paradise Road The Villa Bentota is located very close to South Colombo and it is a private and exclusive beach side resort. You will find 15 individually designed suites and rooms at this resort featuring all modern services and amenities. 
For booking and other details: Paradise Road The Villa Bentota The Amanwella Resort 
This is one of the best Sri Lanka beach resorts sited on the southern coast of the island. This beautiful resort is positioned amongst a coconut grove that faces the white sand beach. 
Suites at this resort are connected by pathways leading to public areas, beach and infinity pool. There are ocean suites that give visitors the clear views of the beautiful ocean. 
For booking and other details: The Amanwella Resort Club Palm Bay Hotel 
This is a charming hotel in Sri Lanka situated very close to the town called Marawila. This resort features spacious gardens that rest beside a beautiful lagoon that is dotted with dense mangroves. You will also find standard guestrooms featuring all modern amenities. 
For booking and other details: Club Palm Bay Hotel Weligama Bay Resort 
This is a newly constructed beach resort featuring twenty-four rooms, suites, villas, bungalows and a very large garden consisting of tropical plants and palm trees. Guests at this resort can enjoy waterfront dining, spa treatments, snorkeling, tea lounging, fishing and sailing. 
For book and other details: Weligama Bay Resort Saman Villas 
You can always visit the Saman Villas if you are looking for a romantic getaway in Sri Lanka. This resort is located on a rock outcrop that overlooks the coast of Bentota and it offers comfortable villas with glorious views and casual luxury. 
For booking and other details: Saman Villas Haridra Resort & Spa 
Haridra Resort & Spa is one of the best Sri Lanka beach resorts, which is located in south western coastal town of Wadduwa, Sri Lanka. This charming and luxurious resort welcomes the guests with a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, and a fitness center. 
The stylish suites in this resort provide amenities like flat screen television, free WIFI, private terrace, minibar, etc. You can even enjoy many water sports at the private beach in this resort.
